overview: When my step mom comes home, she is always in a bad mood and seems to take it out on me. She tells me I have to listen to her and do exactly as she says. I always do what she says despite some of the things she asks being weird. She tells me I need to strip down naked and let her worship my body. I think it's weird but it feels so good. My step mom sure fucks me good but always under the oddest circumstances!!
title: Evil Lesbian Stepmother
